author: slava77
body:
based on https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/31731#issuecomment-706369821

multiple instances of DeepMETProducer (stream module) can end up using the same `static const ... input_list` initialized by another instance, which is a wrong behavior
title: static const -> const for thread safety in DeepMETProducer::produce variable
